## Load Packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
install.packages("dataRetrieval")
library(dataRetrieval)
#vignette("dataRetrieval",package = "dataRetrieval")
```

## Haw River at Haw River, NC 
```{r}
siteNo1 <- "02096500"
pCode1 <- "00060"
start.date1 <- "1928-10-01"
end.date1 <- "2019-07-11"

Haw1 <- readNWISuv(siteNumbers = siteNo1,
                     parameterCd = pCode1,
                     startDate = start.date1,
                     endDate = end.date1)

Haw1 <- renameNWISColumns(Haw1)

view(Haw1)
```

## Haw River near Bynum, NC
```{r}
siteNo2 <- "02096960"
pCode2 <- "00060"
start.date2 <- "1973-09-01"
end.date2 <- "2019-07-11"

Haw2 <- readNWISuv(siteNumbers = siteNo2,
                     parameterCd = pCode2,
                     startDate = start.date2,
                     endDate = end.date2)

Haw2 <- renameNWISColumns(Haw2)

view(Haw2)
```

## Site Attribute URLs
```{r}
Haw1_att <- attr(Haw1, "url")
Haw1_att

Haw2_att <- attr(Haw2, "url")
Haw2_att
```
